response.original_title: 15 Años De Producción Propia De Tcm
response.overview: Celebration of the 15th anniversary of TCM with the screening of the special program 15 years of TCM's own production, which includes the testimonies of many of the personalities of Spanish cinema who have been interviewed before the TCM cameras. From Pedro Almodóvar to Alejandro Amenábar, from Fernando Fernán Gómez to José Antonio Bayona, we review with them our conversations, adventures and misadventures, during the three decades of life of the channel.
response.title: 15 Years Of Own Production Of Tcm
